name: SecureClaw Gateway Bridge
description: Expose a single side-effect tool (secureclaw_act, alias mirage_act) that forwards to the local Python SecureClaw MCP gateway (gateway.mcp_server), or to a remote SecureClaw HTTP gateway via capsule.mcp_proxy.

python.description: Python executable used to spawn the SecureClaw MCP gateway (default: python).

session_id.description: Optional MIRAGE_SESSION_ID to bind sealed handles to this OpenClaw run.

gateway_http_url.description: Optional MIRAGE_GATEWAY_HTTP_URL. If set, the plugin spawns capsule.mcp_proxy instead of the local gateway.mcp_server.

http_token.description: Optional MIRAGE_HTTP_TOKEN for the remote HTTP gateway (Authorization: Bearer ...).
